Articles.Content:
This mod in its various incarnations has been sitting on my hard drive, occasionally being added to, for the past year, with only a hidden unofficial release. Now I release it here.

SUDRIC SYSTEM

https://github.com/GregroxMun/SudricPlanetSystemKSP/releases/tag/0.1 Download at GitHub. Play it and don't forget to tell me what you think, good and bad. Design wise, not just bugs or features you disliked or liked.

Screenshots, in no particular order, rather incomplete:


Sudric, the home planet. A tad smaller and denser than Kerbin.


Drury, the first gas giant.


Delsip, the second gas giant.


Dense, thin air, larger than Kerbin. Hardly Super-Tylo levels of difficulty, but it's certainly Sudric System's most difficult planet.


Dirty Ice Ball


Based upon Percival Lowell's criss-crossed Mars maps.

 

As it stands right now, Sudric's system has parts that are over a year old. I've grown a lot in a year in terms of ideas, knowledge, and skill. Some pieces are still placeholders or are remarkably outdated.

Sudric is meant to be a fairly realistic system with a Stockalike appearance, though recent analysis suggests error in this regard. (Most obviously in the orbital mechanics situation in the Drury system)

Looks interesting, will give it a go.

thanks for all of your great work.

Cheers.
